dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-typing
dependencies.description:
This is a backport of the standard library typing module to Python
versions older than 3.6.

dependencies.name: py-functools32
dependencies.description:
Backport of the functools module from Python 3.2.3 for use on 2.7 and
PyPy.

dependent_to.description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the
terminal.

dependent_to.description: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports.

dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.

CliKit is a group of utilities to build beautiful and testable command

Evaluate and transform D matrices, 3-j symbols, and (scalar or spin-
weighted) spherical harmonics

dependent_to.name: py-tomlkit
